alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 30 at 3:54PM EDT until October 02 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to 1 to 3 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas in North Topsail Beach, along the lower New River, White Oak River, Bogue and Core Sounds, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 2 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 3 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in some areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in an elevated threat of property damage. Flooding will extend inland from the waterfront threatening some homes and businesses. Some road closures and flooding of vehicles will be possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/10 PM 5.0 -0.8 1.4 1 Minor 01/10 AM 5.7 -0.1 1.6 1 Moderate 01/10 PM 5.1 -0.7 1.8 1 Minor 02/11 AM 5.9 0.1 1.8 1 Moderate 02/11 PM 4.8 -1.0 1.7 1 None 03/12 PM 5.5 -0.3 1.6 1 Moderate &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; West Carteret
